member.remarks:
Pattern:
^(?:[0-9]|[1-9][0-9]?|1[01][0-9]|120)$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match with 4 alternative expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [0-9].
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [1-9].
○ Match a character in the set [0-9] atomically, optionally.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match '1'.
○ Match a character in the set [01].
○ Match a character in the set [0-9].
○ Match the string "120".
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: T:Furion.Validation.PasswordValidator
member.summary: 密码验证器
member.remarks: 密码长度为 6-18 位，包含至少一个字母和一个数字

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.PasswordValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^(?=.*[a-zA-Z])(?=.*\\d).{6,18}$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match a character other than '\n' greedily any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Za-z].
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match a character other than '\n' greedily any number of times.
○ Match a Unicode digit.
○ Match a character other than '\n' greedily at least 6 and at most 18 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: T:Furion.Validation.PhoneNumberValidator
member.summary: 手机号验证器

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.PhoneNumberValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^(?:(?:\\+|00)86)?1[3-9]\\d{9}$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match with 2 alternative expressions.
○ Match '+'.
○ Match the string "00".
○ Match the string "86".
○ Match '1'.
○ Match a character in the set [3-9].
○ Match a Unicode digit exactly 9 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: T:Furion.Validation.StrongPasswordValidator
member.summary: 强类型密码验证器
member.remarks: 密码长度最少 6 位，包括至少 1 个大写字母，1 个小写字母，1 个数字，1 个特殊字符

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.StrongPasswordValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^\\S*(?=\\S{6,})(?=\\S*\\d)(?=\\S*[A-Z])(?=\\S*[a-z])(?=\\S*[!@#$%^&*? ])\\S*$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character atomically at least 6 times.
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
○ Match a Unicode digit.
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Z].
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [a-z].
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [ !#-&*?@^].
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.remarks:

^(?:(?:\\d{3}-)?\\d{8}|^(?:\\d{4}-)?\\d{7,8})(?:-\\d+)?$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match with 2 alternative expressions.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match a Unicode digit exactly 3 times.
○ Match '-'.
○ Match a Unicode digit exactly 8 times.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match a Unicode digit exactly 4 times.
○ Match '-'.
○ Match a Unicode digit greedily at least 7 and at most 8 times.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match '-'.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least once.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: T:Furion.Validation.UserNameValidator
member.summary: 用户名验证器
member.remarks: 长度 4-16 位，仅支持字母，数字，下划线，减号组合

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.UserNameValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{4,16}$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [-0-9A-Z_a-z] atomically at least 4 and at most 16 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.
